message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but inflation is a pain!
Come on Bob, let's meet in the middle!
I'm feeling the inflation pinch, Alice.  This is my final offer!
Don't bluff, Bob! You're losing value every round!
Alice, let's be real.  This has gone on long enough.  50/50 is the only fair deal.
You're desperate, I can tell. My offer is still better than nothing!
